about_the_game:
Upon purchasing this content, Riding Board Effect Set 2 will become
available to use in Megaton Musashi W: Wired.

A pack containing
of 3 cool effects to customize
the newly added Riding Board!

"Riding Board Effect Set 2" contains
the following effects:

- Burning Black
- Particle Gold
- Ring Green

*Once purchased, you can change the effects of your
Riding Board from the Riding Board section of the
Appearance Customization menu.
